org.apache.archiva.repository

Class AbstractRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.AbstractRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditableRepository, Repository, RepositoryEventHandler, RepositoryEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractManagedRepository, AbstractRemoteRepository

    public abstract class AbstractRepository
extends Object
implements EditableRepository, RepositoryEventListener
    Implementation of a repository with the necessary fields for a bare repository. No features are provided. Capabilities and features must be implemented by concrete classes.

      • getLocation

        public URI getLocation()
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Returns the location of this repository. For local repositories this might be a file URI, for remote repositories a http URL or some very repository specific schemes. Each repository has only one unique location.
        Specified by:
        getLocation in interface Repository
        Returns:
        The repository location.

      • getLocalPath

        public Path getLocalPath()
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Returns the local path that this repository uses, if it stores data locally. You should keep in mind, that repository implementations may not store any data in this directory. E.g. if the repository data is handled by a database. So the content of this directory is very implementation specific. Users of this directory must know about the repository file layout if they use this path. Repository implementations should always return a valid path, even if there is no locally stored data. Some extensions may use the path to store their own repository specific data, e.g. statistics, metadata,...
        Specified by:
        getLocalPath in interface Repository
        Returns:
        the filesystem path to the repository.

      • setScanned

        public void setScanned(boolean scanned)
        Description copied from interface: EditableRepository
        Sets the flag for scanning the repository. If true, the repository will be scanned. You have to set the scheduling times, if you set this to true.
        Specified by:
        setScanned in interface EditableRepository
        Parameters:
        scanned - if true, the repository is scanned regulary.
